io.micronaut.security.authentication

Class PrincipalArgumentBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.authentication.PrincipalArgumentBinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArgumentBinder<Principal,HttpRequest<?>>, TypeArgumentBinder<Principal,HttpRequest<?>>, RequestArgumentBinder<Principal>, TypedRequestArgumentBinder<Principal>

    @Singleton
public class PrincipalArgumentBinder
extends Object
implements TypedRequestArgumentBinder<Principal>
    Responsible for binding a Principal to a route argument.

    1.0
    Author:
